Reviews.Author: Pam
Reviews.Content: I purchased my tablet from Best Buy for $99. I looked online for hours, and think this was the best deal for the price. It's fast, HD, not to old of and Android version. Charging it is a little annoying. It takes awhile to charge via the USB charger, or USB w/ wall outlet charger. The charge lasts a long time though. I recommend shutting it down for the night or when not in use for awhile, because it uses a lot of juice still when it's on sleep mode. Excellent tablet for the price. I was seeing $200 tablets that had worse specs than this. I spent $185 for a tablet 2 years ago, and this is 10 times better, for almost half the price. Time will tell how it stands up long term.
Reviews.Title: Awesome deal

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: We finally bought Toshiba tablets that were on sale after going through the mistake of trying cheap brand tablets. I waited a month before reviewing our purchases and am pleased. Easy set up, the battery life is decent and I'm able to password protect it so the children have to have permission to get on them. There is glare on the screen when sitting near a window or outdoors but assume a screen protector might help with that.Should have gone with this tablet in the first place.
Reviews.Title: Excellent tablet for reasonable price

Reviews.Author: Delores C, Nickerson
Reviews.Content: my old tablet, bit the dust  looked it up on AMAZON  and  there it was, jut what I was looking for a nice7 inch tablet---again  THANKS
Reviews.Title: Toshiba Excite 7 inch

Reviews.Author: Glafiro Guerrero "GG"
Reviews.Content: Good quality at an unbeatable price, able to download most Android apps, easy to navigate and set up, reliable tablet by a trusted brand.
Reviews.Title: Good value tablet

Reviews.Author: D. Gavey
Reviews.Content: Just as the specs said and more.  It really has the Toshiba quality..  For $99, it is a steal, just buy it....
Reviews.Title: Fantastic

Reviews.Author: Ion M. Kirksey
Reviews.Content: It takes an EXTREMELY long time to fully charge. It works great, but I wish I knew about the charge time before I bought it.
Reviews.Title: Functional, but takes forever to charge.

Reviews.Author: Milagros Alvalle
Reviews.Content: love it, i highly recommended it and the price was just right i take it everywhere with me. Get It
Reviews.Title: Love it

Reviews.Author: John K.
Reviews.Content: The person I bought it for loves it. It only has 8 GB of memory but it has an SD card slot.
Reviews.Title: Great tablet for the price

Reviews.Author: monimone77
Reviews.Content: Very nice tablet.  Great screen, fast processing, full featured unit.  Can't believe this thing is soo great for under $100!!!!  Works very well, smooth and extremely happy with purchase.  All apps work flawlessly.  Great purchase.
Reviews.Title: Great inexpensive tablet

Reviews.Author: Daniel Lafollette
Reviews.Content: I'm writing my review on my Toshiba Excite 7c. For $99 it's a great deal. They put the emphisis on the right features. I like it!
Reviews.Title: Great value

ProductInfo.Features:
Android 4.2.2 Jelly Bean; 7-inch Display
RK3168 Dual-Core ARM Cortex-A9 Processor
8 GB Flash Memory, 1 GB RAM Memory
11.30-hour battery life, .78 pounds
